full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO LA BRTEN PA'I GLUD RDZONGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (DPAL LDAN LHA MO'I LA BRTEN PA'I GLUD RDZONGS 'DI NI RANG DANG BSKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA PHAN PA'I PHYIR MA MO'I GLUD RDZONGS RGYAS PA RNAMS LAS CUNG ZAD BSDUS, ,BSDUS PA RNAMS LAS CUNG ZAD BSNAN TE, BSDUS PA RNAMS LAS CUNG ZAD BSNAN TE, CHOS RJE'I THA SHAL SKAL BZANG MING CAN GYIS BSGRIGS PA LA, SPYAN LDAN MKHA' PA RNAMS LA BZOD PA GSOL, ,YI GE PA NI AU LIM @006A *, ,CI PI LIG THU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL LO, ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
